a.n: Franco Ambrosetti Quintet live at Estival Lugano

p.k: The composer, trumpeter and bugle player Franco Ambrossetti performs with his quintet in his native Lugano as part of the Estival.
p.d: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. The composer, trumpeter and bugle player Franco Ambrosetti performs with his quintet in his native Lugano as part of the Estival.
